attributes.action: make CSA payments go to the children rather off-set the ex Partners benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If your exPartner is living on Government Benefits your CSA payments are off-set against these benefits.   This leaves your child no better of.  In effect you are subsidising the governments obligation to provide these benefits. Your child still goes without.  To make your payments go to your children add your name to this petition.
